channel.title: Organized tutorial list
channel.description:
[center]RS2 Server tutorial list[/center]
[center][code]This tutorial list was created to help people find what they need faster, to speed up on development, whether it is to get started, or just help with a problem.[/code][/center]
[center][code]Written by Kihomura from Moparscape.org. If you see this topc copied and posted anywhere other than here, let me know, and I'll see what I can do.[/code][/center]
[b]Beginner tutorials[/b]
Changing your character's rights (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,308083.0.html Multi-combat fighting areas (Czar) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,300310.0.html Making safezones (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,292097.0.html
[b]Intermediate tutorials[/b]
'Mass click' Action fludding protector(wL) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,307628.0.html Devolution Dueling item duplication fix (Devo) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,292325.msg2354228.html#msg2354228 Fixing Devolution membership (Devo) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,303195.msg2431732.html#msg2431732 Adding potions (Devo) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,288415.0.html Rog3r's New Devolution emote method (Devo) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,300629.msg2412931.html#msg2412931 Rog3r's New Devolution foot method (Devo) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,300470.0.html Buy 20 [Client/Serverside] (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,307065.0.html#lastPost Hasumon's Better KBD attacks (Czar) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,289949.0.html Perfect teleport timers(Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,306020.0.html Recoloring items [Client/Server side] (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,305920.0.html Adding the Guthan's set effect (Czar) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,295157.0.html WinterLove item duplication glitch (wL) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,288412.0.html Effective warning system (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,296935.0.html Changing currencies (Devo) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,298761.0.html Fixing beards for Hoods and Medium helmets (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285238.0.html Adding skill requirements to items (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285892.0.html Adding PKing skulls (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,296279.0.html Prayer base (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,296299.0.html
[b]Experienced tutorials[/b]
Meiscooldude's Allowing Only One Connection for every IP Address (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,286718.msg2320676.html#msg2320676 Managing 'If-Else' blocks (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,296935.0.html
[b]Uneeded, but optional tutorials[/b]
Hasumon's Dragonfire shield effect(Czar) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,286372.msg2318081.html#msg2318081 Dragon/Barrow armour smithing (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,284565.0.html Dragonfire shield special attack (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285778.0.html
[b]503+ Tutorials[/b]
Adding the 508 cache(Pali-508) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,304556.msg2441115.html#msg2441115 Godsword specials without damage(Pali-508) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,306789.0.html Setting up your 508 server (Pali-508) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,301832.msg2421884.html#msg2421884 508 Theiving base (Pali-508) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,304102.0.html Base for 100% prayer (Drask-508) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,305210.0.html Special attacks on NPCs (Pali-508) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,305043.0.html
[b] -In all due respect, I posted this here, because I doubt it would belong in the tutorial section, as it is not a tutorial; And the last tutorial list got removed.
If this in anyway breeches a rule of some sort, remove or lock this topic, and take actions against my account.[/b]

I tried before, but this might get lucky.[/quote]

Aww that sucks, I was thinking that since the last one got removed, I would make this one, oh well.

item.title: Organized tutorial list
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[center]RS2 Server tutorial list[/center]

[center]This tutorial list was created to help people find what they need faster, to speed up on development, whether it is to get started, or just help with a problem.[/center]

[center]Written by Kihomura from Moparscape.org. If you see this topc copied and posted anywhere other than here, let me know, and I'll see what I can do.[/center]

Beginner tutorials

Changing your character’s rights (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,308083.0.html
Multi-combat fighting areas (Czar) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,300310.0.html
Making safezones (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,292097.0.html

Intermediate tutorials

‘Mass click’ Action fludding protector(wL) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,307628.0.html
Devolution Dueling item duplication fix (Devo) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,292325.msg2354228.html#msg2354228
Fixing Devolution membership (Devo) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,303195.msg2431732.html#msg2431732
Adding potions (Devo) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,288415.0.html

Buy 20 [Client/Serverside] (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,307065.0.html#lastPost
Hasumon’s Better KBD attacks (Czar) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,289949.0.html
Perfect teleport timers(Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,306020.0.html
Recoloring items [Client/Server side] (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,305920.0.html
Adding the Guthan’s set effect (Czar) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,295157.0.html
WinterLove item duplication glitch (wL) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,288412.0.html
Effective warning system (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,296935.0.html
Changing currencies (Devo) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,298761.0.html
Fixing beards for Hoods and Medium helmets (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285238.0.html
Adding skill requirements to items (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285892.0.html
Adding PKing skulls (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,296279.0.html
Prayer base (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,296299.0.html

Experienced tutorials

Meiscooldude’s Allowing Only One Connection for every IP Address (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,286718.msg2320676.html#msg2320676
Managing ‘If-Else’ blocks (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,296935.0.html

Uneeded, but optional tutorials

Hasumon’s Dragonfire shield effect(Czar) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,286372.msg2318081.html#msg2318081
Dragon/Barrow armour smithing (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,284565.0.html
Dragonfire shield special attack (Any base) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285778.0.html

503+ Tutorials
